lines.gurmukhi: Aihinis BRmq kml kumudnI ko sis imil ibCrq sog hrK ibAwphI
lines.transliteration_english: Ahinisi Bhramat Kamal Koumudanee Ko Sasi , Mili Bichharat Sog Harakh Biaapahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The lotus flower keeps waiting for a glimpse of the Sun during the day while Nymphea lotus (kumudini) is ever eager to behold the moon. Lotus flower feels happy to meet the Sun during the day while at night, it feels distressed. On the contrary a Nymphea

lines.gurmukhi: riv sis aulMiG srin siqgur ghI crn kml suK sMpt imlwphI
lines.transliteration_english: Ravi Sasi Ulanghi Sarani Satigur Gahee , Charan Kamal Soukh Sanpat Milaapahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Going beyond the attitude of the Sun and Moon where they meet or separate from their beloved, a Guru-conscious person takes the refuge of the True Guru, and remains absorbed in the tranquil and comforting holy feet of the True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: shj smwiD inj Awsn subwsn kY mDu mkrMd rsu luiBq AjwphI
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaj Samaadhi Nij Aasan Soubaasan Kai , Madhu Makarand Rasu Loubhit Ajaapahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a bumble bee is enamored by the fragrance of a flower and remains enticed in its love, so does a Guru-oriented person remains engrossed in the fragrance of elixir-like Naam in the seat of the mystical tenth door.

lines.gurmukhi: qiRgun AqIq huie ibsRwm inhkwm Dwm aunmn mgn Anwhd AlwphI ]266]
lines.transliteration_english: Trigoun Ateet Hui Bisraam Nihakaam Dhaama , Ounaman Magan Anaahad Alaapahee ?266?

Shabad OS B.translation: Free from the influence of three traits of the maya (mammon), a Guru-conscious person is ever absorbed in singing the melody of the Naam in the mystical tenth door state of high spirituality. (266)
